metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36387 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.2. fs/io_uring.c hasa use-after-free related to io_async_task_func and ctx reference holding,aka CID-6d816e088c35.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
